SELECT item.ID, item.ITEM_CODE, ifnull(s.stock_num,0) as stockNum, ifnull(o.sell_num,0) as sellNum, item.CD_CATEGORY_ID as categoryId, category.CATEGORY_NAME as categoryName, item.ITEM_NAME, item.ITEM_DESCRIBE, item.YIELDLY, item.SPEC, item.BASE_PRICE, item.MEMBER_PRICE, item.PRICING_MANNER, item.SELL_STATUS, item.SELL_UNIT, item.SELL_PRICE, item.BAO_ZHI_QI, item.SHI_YI_REN_QUN, item.XIAN_SHI_QIANG_GOU, item.XIN_PIN_CHANG_XIAN, item.RE_MAI_TUI_JIAN, cr.PATH as picUrl FROM cd_item item INNER JOIN cd_category category ON item.CD_CATEGORY_ID = category.id left join cd_stock s on s.item_id = item.id left join ( select count(1) as sell_num,item_id from tb_order_item oi left join tb_order o on o.ORDER_NO = oi.ORDER_NO where o.ORDER_STATUS != 9 group by oi.ITEM_CODE ) o on o.item_id = item.id LEFT JOIN cd_resource cr ON item.id = cr.entity_id and cr.entity_type = 'cd_item' AND cr.resource_type = 'PICTURE' AND cr.is_default = 1
item.SELL_STATUS = 1
AND item.CD_CATEGORY_ID IN ( SELECT id from cd_category where cd_category.id = #{categoryId} or cd_category.parent_id = #{categoryId})
AND (item.ITEM_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
AND
item.${label} = 1
AND item.ID IN
${item}
ORDER BY item.${orderField} ASCDESC

SELECT item.ID, item.ITEM_CODE, ifnull(s.stock_num,0) as stockNum, ifnull(o.sell_num,0) as sellNum, item.CD_CATEGORY_ID as categoryId, category.CATEGORY_NAME as categoryName, item.ITEM_NAME, item.ITEM_DESCRIBE, item.YIELDLY, item.SPEC, item.BASE_PRICE, item.MEMBER_PRICE, item.PRICING_MANNER, item.SELL_STATUS, item.SELL_UNIT, item.SELL_PRICE, item.BAO_ZHI_QI, item.SHI_YI_REN_QUN, item.XIAN_SHI_QIANG_GOU, item.XIN_PIN_CHANG_XIAN, item.RE_MAI_TUI_JIAN, detail.ITEM_DETAIL_CONTENT as detailContent, cr.PATH as picUrl, cr.IS_DEFAULT as isDefaultPath FROM cd_item item INNER JOIN cd_category category ON item.CD_CATEGORY_ID = category.id left join cd_stock s on s.item_id = item.id left join ( select count(1) as sell_num,item_id from tb_order_item oi left join tb_order o on o.ORDER_NO = oi.ORDER_NO where o.ORDER_STATUS != 9 group by oi.ITEM_CODE ) o on o.item_id = item.id LEFT JOIN cd_item_detail detail ON item.ID = detail.CD_ITEM_ID LEFT JOIN cd_resource cr ON item.id = cr.entity_id and cr.entity_type = 'cd_item' AND cr.resource_type = 'PICTURE' WHERE item.iD = #{id}
